name: api_networking_UploadHandler
description: Helper object for UnityWebRequests. Manages the buffering and transmission of body data during HTTP requests.

properties.name: contentType
properties.description: Determines the default Content-Type header which will be transmitted with the outbound HTTP request.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The raw data which will be transmitted to the remote server as body data. (Read Only)

properties.name: progress
properties.description: Returns the proportion of data uploaded to the remote server compared to the total amount of data to

properties.name: Dispose
properties.description: Signals that this UploadHandler is no longer being used, and should clean up any resources it is usi
